thread.title: Fox World Travel Launches Winter Escape 2016 with Q104 and KTTS
thread.title_full: Fox World Travel Launches Winter Escape 2016 with Q104 and KTTS

author: Brian Hurley
title: Fox World Travel Launches Winter Escape 2016 with Q104 and KTTS
text:
Fox World Travel is excited to announce Winter Escape 2016. Leave the winter blues and join country music stations Q104 of Kansas City, Missouri, and KTTS of Springfield, Missouri, on their first ever Winter Escape. They’re hosting this kick-off event in Mexico with some of the hottest names in country music – Dan + Shay and Michael Ray. The unforgettable vacation will run January 17-23 and also include morning show personalities from both Q104 and KTTS. This exclusive vacation package includes six nights All-In Luxury at the 5-star Royalton Riviera Cancun. Vacationers will enjoy a private concert with Dan + Shay and Michael Ray, exclusive meet-and-greet autograph sessions, live radio broadcasts with Q104 and KTTS plus a private reception and other surprises. This acclaimed resort opened in November 2014 and has already been recognized for their guest service. The Royalton’s exclusive concept is devoted to providing guests with a unique experience, combining luxury product, exceptional service and fantastic attention to detail. The experience includes unlimited meals, drinks, 24-hour room service and more included in one amazing package, which also includes nonstop, direct flights from Kansas City via Aero Mexico with Funjet Vacations. Flight arrangements can be customized from other departure cities as well.
“Dan + Shay and Michael Ray are on an incredible roll right now in country music and we’re so happy to work with both Q104 and KTTS to bring their listeners a once in a lifetime vacation experience. Plus, we’re staying at one of the newest resorts Rivera Maya area to combine vacation, country music, fantastic food and friendship all rolled into one week of fun”, said Brian Hurley, Vice-President of Vacation Travel.
For more information, visit http://media.gofox.com/winter-escape or call Fox World Travel at 866-463-6946.
Fox World Travel was founded in 1960 and is ranked as top travel agency in the United States, according to the Business Travel Survey in Business Travel News. Fox World Travel owns and operates 11 retail travel locations throughout Wisconsin as well as a full service corporate travel division and Premier Meetings and Incentives in Oshkosh and Fox World Travel School. Fox World Travel is the largest vacation travel agency in Wisconsin. Fox World Travel’s corporate travel division is a leading provider of travel management solutions, serving travelers as they navigate the globe while guiding organizations toward successful policies, compliance and financial advantages in their domestic and global travel programs. Visit Fox World Travel online at http://www.GoFox.com .
-end-
